text: "Lover Lover" is a 1996 song by Australian singer Jimmy Barnes and is the leading single from his greatest hits album Barnes Hits Anthology. It went to number 6 in Australia and number 13 in New Zealand. It was written by Barnes' wife Jane. ==Track listing== CD Single # "Lover Lover" - 3:31 ==References== Category:1996 songs Category:Jimmy Barnes songs
title: Lover Lover
